```{r, results="hide"}
library(Seurat)
library(Signac)
library(rlist)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Data 

```{r data}
data = readRDS("REH_GM12078_combined.rds")
data
```

## Preprocess Data 

```{r, }
#Normalize 
data <- RunTFIDF(data)

#Top features
data <- FindTopFeatures(data, min.cutoff = 20)

#linear dim reduction 
data <- RunSVD(data)

#non-linear dim reduction
data <- RunUMAP(data, dims = 2:50, reduction = 'lsi')
```

Plot and group by original dataset. 

```{r}
DimPlot(data, group.by = 'dataset', pt.size = 0.1)
```
